articles.description: Tech News News: Apple went with Google over Sam Altman's OpenAI for one straightforward reason: better technology. CEO Tim Cook laid it out plainly during the company.

articles.content: For an iPad user, the Apple Pencil is an indispensable accessory. However, if you ever misplace yours or it's damaged, you don't have to spend $80 or $130 to get a replacement unit from Apple. The Xt… [+1197 chars]

articles.title: Windows 11 26H2 confirmed for later this year, as references spotted on Windows Update page - Windows Latest
articles.description: If you're on Windows 11 25H2 or 24H2, you'll be getting Windows 11 26H2 later this year, likely around October 2026.
articles.content: If you’re currently on Windows 11 25H2 or 24H2, you’ll be getting Windows 11 26H2 later this year, likely around October 2026. There’s also “Windows 11 26H1,” but it’s only meant for new Snapdragon X… [+5335 chars]
